Methods in org.mule.api.component that return LifecycleAdapterFactory
 LifecycleAdapterFactory JavaComponent.getLifecycleAdapterFactory()
          Returns the factory used create life-cycle adaptors that are used to wrap component instance.

Uses of LifecycleAdapterFactory in org.mule.api.model
 

Methods in org.mule.api.model that return LifecycleAdapterFactory
 LifecycleAdapterFactory Model.getLifecycleAdapterFactory()
          The lifecycle adapter is used by the model to translate Mule lifecycle event to events that components registered with the model understand.
 

Methods in org.mule.api.model with parameters of type LifecycleAdapterFactory
 void Model.setLifecycleAdapterFactory(LifecycleAdapterFactory lifecycleAdapterFactory)
          Sets the lifecycleAdapterFactory on the model.
